summary: This mod adds the Dread Crossbow & Dread Bolts to the game, and can be crafted at any forge in skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1366.photobucket.com/albums/r777/SkyrimForDaWin/DreadCrossbowDescriptionAsset02_zpsedd80c51.png[/IMG]
[b][size=5][center]DESCRIPTION[/center][/size][/b]
[center]This mod was first design as a plugin for The Dark Tower, but we decided to upload it as a standalone.
This crossbow and Bolt are slightly more powerful then the Vanilla Dawnguard Crossbow and Bolt.
We also Increased it\'s range and reduce the gravity drop of the Dread Bolt making the set (Crossbow & Bolt) 
more accurate for long shot. See the video on the mod page for all the details.

The Dread Crossbow & Dread Bolt are craftable at any forge under the steel section and do not require any 
advencement in the quests of Dawnguard.(You can Craft it at any time as long as you have the Materials / Perks)[/center]

[center][youtube]iu5F3BlbOEM[/youtube][youtube]QnSOjghXRIw[/youtube][/center]
[center][youtube]ckSYR3tdcHs[/youtube][/center]

[IMG]http://i1366.photobucket.com/albums/r777/SkyrimForDaWin/DreadCrossbowDescriptionAsset02_zpsedd80c51.png[/IMG]
[b][size=5][center]NOTE(s) FROM THE AUTHOR[/center][/size][/b]
[center]Please feel free to take any screenshots of the crossbow and/or videos, we will be happy to add them to the mod page.
The armor seen on my character in the pictures is called \"dread armor\" and can be found in \"Reaper\'s Dark Tower\" mod, See link below (recommended mods section)
Big thanks to Jojjo, witch this mod would not exist if it wasn\'t of his hard work, i\'d suggest that you visit [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/545784]him & his other mods[/url] and show some luv.
As always enjoy the mod, and don\'t forget to endorse the file.[/center]

[IMG]http://i1366.photobucket.com/albums/r777/SkyrimForDaWin/DreadCrossbowDescriptionAsset02_zpsedd80c51.png[/IMG]
[b][size=5][center]RECOMMENDED MODS[/center][/size][/b]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17863][b][size=3]The Dark Tower[/size][/b][/url] by: Reaper9111
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15494][b][size=3]Dread Knight Weapons Set[/size][/b][/url] by: Jojjo
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18008][b][size=3]Princess of the Woods[/size][/b][/url] by: SydneyB 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10753][b][size=3]Auto Unequip Ammo[/size][/b][/url] by: Mitchalek 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20787][b][size=3]Cerwiden Smart Healer[/size][/b][/url] by: Mujuro
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37204][b][size=3]Unclaimed Delivery[/size][/b][/url] by: SkyrimForDaWin[/center]

[IMG]http://i1366.photobucket.com/albums/r777/SkyrimForDaWin/DreadCrossbowDescriptionAsset02_zpsedd80c51.png[/IMG]
[b][size=5][center]REQUIREMENTS[/center][/size][/b]
[center]Dawnguard DLC[/center]

[IMG]http://i1366.photobucket.com/albums/r777/SkyrimForDaWin/DreadCrossbowDescriptionAsset02_zpsedd80c51.png[/IMG]
[b][size=5][center]INSTALL INFO[/center][/size][/b]
[center]Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Download the file from Nexus
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the \"Activates the selected mod\" button.


Manual install
==============
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and chek the folder structure.
2. Copy to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\:
.- the Meshes folder
.- the Textures folder
.- the .esp if there is one in the mod.
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say \"Yes to all\".  


Uninstall
=========
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the \"Deactivates the selected mod\" button.


Manual uninstall
================
1. Delete:
.- the folder \\meshes\\that you have previously installed.
.- the folder \\Textures\\that you have previously installed.
.- the .esp if there is one in the mod.[/center]

[IMG]http://i1366.photobucket.com/albums/r777/SkyrimForDaWin/DreadCrossbowDescriptionAsset02_zpsedd80c51.png[/IMG]
[b][size=5][center]UPDATE[/center][/size][/b]
[center]Not aplicable at this time.[/center]

[IMG]http://i1366.photobucket.com/albums/r777/SkyrimForDaWin/DreadCrossbowDescriptionAsset02_zpsedd80c51.png[/IMG]
[b][size=5][center]INCOMPATABILITY & KNOWN ISSUES OR BUGS[/center][/size][/b]
[center]None[/center]

[IMG]http://i1366.photobucket.com/albums/r777/SkyrimForDaWin/DreadCrossbowDescriptionAsset02_zpsedd80c51.png[/IMG]
